title: "ERR wrong number of arguments for 'srem' command" during hard_shutdown
body:
Happens when I CTRL+C sidekiq while workers are running.

```
2013-02-08T22:40:45Z 18581 TID-3gk INFO: Shutting down
2013-02-08T22:40:45Z 18581 TID-4p8 INFO: Shutting down 7 quiet workers
2013-02-08T22:40:45Z 18581 TID-4p8 INFO: Pausing up to 8 seconds to allow workers to finish...
2013-02-08T22:40:53Z 18581 TID-4pa INFO: Still waiting for 1 busy workers
2013-02-08T22:40:54Z 18581 TID-4pa INFO: Pushed 1 messages back to Redis
2013-02-08T22:40:54Z 18581 TID-4pa WARN: {:context=>"Manager#watch_for_shutdown died"}
2013-02-08T22:40:54Z 18581 TID-4pa WARN: ERR wrong number of arguments for 'srem' command
2013-02-08T22:40:54Z 18581 TID-4pa WARN: /triggit/home/triggit/.rbenv/versions/jruby-1.7.2/lib/ruby/gems/shared/gems/redis-3.0.1/lib/redis/client.rb:79:in `call'
/triggit/home/triggit/.rbenv/versions/jruby-1.7.2/lib/ruby/gems/shared/gems/redis-3.0.1/lib/redis.rb:1134:in `srem'
/triggit/home/triggit/.rbenv/versions/jruby-1.7.2/lib/ruby/gems/shared/gems/redis-3.0.1/lib/redis.rb:36:in `synchronize'
/triggit/home/triggit/.rbenv/versions/jruby-1.7.2/lib/ruby/1.9/monitor.rb:211:in `mon_synchronize'
/triggit/home/triggit/.rbenv/versions/jruby-1.7.2/lib/ruby/1.9/monitor.rb:210:in `mon_synchronize'
/triggit/home/triggit/.rbenv/versions/jruby-1.7.2/lib/ruby/gems/shared/gems/redis-3.0.1/lib/redis.rb:36:in `synchronize'
/triggit/home/triggit/.rbenv/versions/jruby-1.7.2/lib/ruby/gems/shared/gems/redis-3.0.1/lib/redis.rb:1133:in `srem'
/triggit/home/triggit/.rbenv/versions/jruby-1.7.2/lib/ruby/gems/shared/bundler/gems/sidekiq-7be06c3d3ff3/lib/sidekiq/manager.rb:133:in `hard_shutdown_in'
/triggit/home/triggit/.rbenv/versions/jruby-1.7.2/lib/ruby/gems/shared/gems/connection_pool-1.0.0/lib/connection_pool.rb:48:in `with'
/triggit/home/triggit/.rbenv/versions/jruby-1.7.2/lib/ruby/gems/shared/gems/connection_pool-1.0.0/lib/connection_pool.rb:47:in `with'
/triggit/home/triggit/.rbenv/versions/jruby-1.7.2/lib/ruby/gems/shared/bundler/gems/sidekiq-7be06c3d3ff3/lib/sidekiq.rb:66:in `redis'
/triggit/home/triggit/.rbenv/versions/jruby-1.7.2/lib/ruby/gems/shared/bundler/gems/sidekiq-7be06c3d3ff3/lib/sidekiq/manager.rb:128:in `hard_shutdown_in'
/triggit/home/triggit/.rbenv/versions/jruby-1.7.2/lib/ruby/gems/shared/bundler/gems/sidekiq-7be06c3d3ff3/lib/sidekiq/util.rb:15:in `watchdog'
/triggit/home/triggit/.rbenv/versions/jruby-1.7.2/lib/ruby/gems/shared/bundler/gems/sidekiq-7be06c3d3ff3/lib/sidekiq/manager.rb:110:in `hard_shutdown_in'
/triggit/home/triggit/.rbenv/versions/jruby-1.7.2/lib/ruby/gems/shared/gems/celluloid-0.12.4/lib/celluloid/tasks/task_fiber.rb:24:in `initialize'
/triggit/home/triggit/.rbenv/versions/jruby-1.7.2/lib/ruby/gems/shared/gems/celluloid-0.12.4/lib/celluloid/tasks/task_fiber.rb:23:in `initialize'
```
